channel.title: CVE Feed for FreshTomato -- FreshTomato
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FreshTomato -- FreshTomato

item.title: CVE-2022-28664|2024-09-16T18:04:16.398Z -- freshtomato -- freshtomato
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the httpd unescape functionality of FreshTomato 2022.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.The `freshtomato-mips` has a vulnerable URL-decoding feature that can lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2023-3991|2024-09-16T16:37:12.991Z -- freshtomato -- freshtomato
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd iperfrun.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2023.3. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
